modName: Dibellas Lunari Gift - Beauties of Skyrim
summary: Dibellas Lunari Gift provides a beautiful Lvl. 1 Lunari character savegame and a facegen NPC-File of the featured character as a modders resource for those who want to import Vardas face to create a new NPC or else.
descriptionHtml:
About this mod

Dibellas Lunari Gift provides a beautiful Lvl. 1 Lunari character savegame and a facegen NPC-File of the featured character as a modders resource for those who want to import Vardas face to create a new NPC or else. I have experimented with the popular Lunari race lately and Varda has been my favourite Lunari so far, so I decided to share here in this small mod.


About your character

Varda is a sophisticated young Lunari lady ready to explore the vast wilderness of Skyrim. She joined Hadvar and waits for adventures inside Helgen Keep...


Required Mods

Our gorgeous young Lady first needs some fresh blood to the game ( in the following load order ):

The fabulous ApachiiSkyHair mod by apachii AND the 10 new female hairstyles file which can be found within the \"Optional Files\" section.
- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

The great Lunari Race by bhaktisean.
- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21602
	
The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot
- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722

Now the Cutie is ready to go.


Installation :

Just copy the mod file into your Skyrim Savegame data folder, start your game and load the \"Varda\"-Savegame file to start right into the action.

The optional NPC-file is a pure modders resource, which can be used to import Varda\'s facegen data for NPC creation, etc.


Other mods :

 Seductive Lips HD
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22701

- Dibellas Temptress gift - Beauties of Skyrim
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22190

- Molag Bals Temptress Gift - Evil Beauties of Skyrim
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23829

- Realistic Female Face Skin HD
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23447

- Beauties of Skyrim - Eilinel Temptress Vampire Start Savegame
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22063



Author\'s note :

If you enjoy my mod please endorse or leave a comment or load up some pics of Varda. Criticism is also welcome since it can only improve my work.

If you create NPC\'s with my NPC-file please credit me if you load them up here on the Nexus.
author: EcthelionOtW
